name: Minotaur (itch) (TiKo Pigeon)
description:
A Game for the Greek Mythology Jam 2017,

This game is based off the story of Theseus and the Minotaur.

The Goal of the game is to roam around the maze looking for your sword dodging the Minotaur as it chases you down, Once the sword has been collected you can fight back.

====================Controls========================

W - Move Up
A  - Move Left
S   - Move Down
D  - Move Right

Walk into the sword to pick it up.
Walk into the Minotaur once you've collected to the sword to kill it.

===================================================
